# M10 Basic R

## Topics

-   Present R basics — syntax, data types, and operators
-   Present R data structures – vectors, lists, matrices, and data frames
-   Create a function in R, and use it in a program

## Readings

### Required

-   [W3Schools R Tutorial](https://www.w3schools.com/r/default.asp)
-   [W3Schools R Data Structures](https://www.w3schools.com/r/r_vectors.asp)

### Optional

-   [Yau, R Tutorial, "R Introduction"](http://www.r-tutor.com/r-introduction)
    -   Super concise.
